    pow3 = [1]

        pow3.append(pow3[-1] * 3 % MOD)
    even = [0] * len(pow3)
    odd = [0] * len(pow3)
    even[0] = 1
    for i in range(len(pow3) - 1):
        even[i + 1] = (even[i] + pow3[i] * odd[i]) % MOD
        odd[i + 1] = (odd[i] + pow3[i] * even[i]) % MOD
    T = [0] * len(pow3)
    for i in range(len(pow3) - 1):
        T[i + 1] = (3 * T[i] + pow3[i + 1] * even[i + 1]) % MOD
    return T[-1]
